crew.name: Tom
crew.description: DJ and vinyls collector himself. He like every styles of music but most interested in electro musics.
crew.selectionButtonContent: His selection in Chicago House and Detroit techno

crew.name: Alex
crew.description: Fan of music electronics, his thing is the synthesizers and boxes rhythms of all kinds. He is also the organizer of evenings and performs in live.
crew.selectionButtonContent: His selection in Electro-House and Techno-Minale made in Berlin

crew.name: Cindy
crew.description: Music lover, Cindy is a big fan of rock and its subgenres. She is also a fan of guitars and bass, she plays as a bassist in a New-Wave/Cold Wave oriented group.
crew.selectionButtonContent: Her selection in New-wave and Punk-rock made in UK

crew.name: Chunli
crew.description: Chunli is unstoppable about hip hop. Her musical culture is solid, she is also a DJ and love scratching.
crew.selectionButtonContent: Her selection in Hip-hop US and Hip-hop UK
